long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Idle Dice is a captivating and addictive free-to-play mobile game that combines the thrill of dice rolling with the relaxing gameplay of an idle clicker. Developed for enthusiasts of both casual and strategic gaming, this title offers a unique experience where players can watch their fortunes rise with the roll of the dice.

Key Features:

ğŸ² Idle Clicker Mechanics: Enjoy the satisfaction of watching your dice roll automatically as you accumulate wealth and progress through the game. The idle clicker element ensures that your earnings keep growing even when you're away.

ğŸ¯ Strategic Upgrades: Strategically invest your earnings in a variety of upgrades to enhance your dice-rolling capabilities. From boosting the roll frequency to unlocking special abilities, the game offers a range of options to tailor your strategy to your liking.

ğŸŒ Global Leaderboards: Compete with players worldwide and showcase your dice-rolling prowess on the global leaderboards. Climb the ranks to become the ultimate dice tycoon and earn the respect of fellow players.

ğŸ‰ Unlockable Dice Sets: Discover and unlock an array of unique dice sets, each with its own distinct design and properties. Collect them all to customize your gaming experience and showcase your style.

ğŸ”§ Optimized for Idle Play: Whether you have a few minutes or a longer gaming session, Idle Dice is designed to accommodate various playstyles. The game's intuitive interface ensures a seamless and enjoyable experience for players of all levels.

# Play more games on the top-left menu.
